body.name: 3-in-1 Phone Mount for car, Diamond Stickers Freely DIY, Sturdy & Secure Long Arm Suction Cup Holder Universal Car Dashboard Windshield Air Vent Car Phone Holder Compatible with All Smartphones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 31 mins
features: 🫧Diamond Stickers Freely DIY: Our product package contains a diamond sticker 12*20cm, you can feel free to stick it on any part of the bracket according to your preference. Add color to your car's interior, glow and refuse to be monotonous.

🫧Pink Phone Holder For Car: The unique color and highly attractive diamond stickers set this pink mount apart from the rest. You can adjust your comfortable viewing angles due to 360 degrees of rotating ball joint and the distance between you and the holder due to telescopic arm
🫧Quick Release&Lock: Just press the release button on the left, clamp arms will smoothly slide to release your phone. Just press the lock bar, your phone will hold on stably.
🫧Attach With a Vent Clip: 3 in1 car phone mount offer a stronger, thinner vent clip, which could hold your phone securely on an air vent in your car.
🫧Fit Universally & Get 24 Months Worry Free Warranty：This cell phone car mount is fit for almost all phones.With our car phone mount, you'll enjoy 24 months warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Sturdy and Adjustable Car Phone Mount for Safer Driving!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased this car phone mount from Amazon, and it has exceeded my expectations in terms of functionality and ease of use. Here's why I love it:Flexible Design:The 360-degree rotating ball joint allows for effortless adjustments to find the perfect viewing angle, and the telescopic arm provides the flexibility to set a comfortable distance between you and the phone holder. This feature ensures a customized and convenient setup for any driver.Quick Release/Lock Mechanism:The quick-release button on the left side of the mount makes it incredibly easy to slide the clamp arms and release your phone swiftly. On the other hand, the lock bar ensures a stable and secure grip once your phone is in place. It's a seamless process that adds to the overall user-friendly experience.Vent Clip Attachment:One standout feature is the vent clip attachment, which is both strong and low-profile. The clip securely holds onto air vents in the car, providing a reliable mounting solution without obstructing the dashboard. It's a sleek and practical design choice.Stable and Gentle Hold:The anti-slip rubber pads, stable support shelf, and firm yet scratch-free claw work in harmony to provide a secure grip on your phone. I appreciate the attention to detail in ensuring a stable hold while also preventing any damage to my device. It gives me confidence that my phone is safe and secure during every drive.Universal Compatibility:I have a diverse range of phones in my household, and this mount accommodates all of them. It's reassuring to know that it's designed to fit almost all phone sizes, making it a versatile choice for different users.In conclusion, this car phone mount combines practical design elements with a user-friendly interface, making it an excellent investment for anyone in need of a reliable and adjustable phone holder for their car. It has made my driving experience safer and more convenient. Highly recommended! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product
reviews.reviewText: I really like this phone mount. It is easy to install and so far seems to be working well.I really like the ability to be able raise and lower it to various positions. It is sturdy and the "Sticky" cup can be refreshed and does not harm your dashboard. It also works well for a portable phone holder when doing videos in various locations as it will restick to various surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tight and Secure! Holds my Phone up Effortlessly!
reviews.reviewText: I used this on the bottom left-hand corner of my 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 windshield. I extended the arm as far out as it would reach into the corner. I suction-cupped it to the glass instead of on the dashboard. Most owners of older-generation rams would know the reason. And voilà works effortlessly.I've never bought one before, and I decided to pull the trigger. I'm in the middle of nowhere and constantly need to use my GPS. I hate distracted driving and noticed I always looked down to follow the directions. No thanks to Google Maps delayed auditory directions.The way I have it currently set up is beyond convenient. I barely shift my gaze to the left and never have to look down now. Surprisingly enough, it doesn't create a blind spot. But I also like to be attentive and sit straight when driving.It holds my phone up, it's stationary but can be adjusted easily, it has a great reach, it releases easily, and it has a spot to connect the charging cord when necessary. I can add a photo if anyone likes this review and is interested. It was a great buy and an even better deal when I got it on sale. Definitely worth the price. I will be recommending it to my circle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable Not Just the Car
reviews.reviewText: This phone holder is great. It's easy to install and seems to be doing nicely so far. It's quite convenient, as it can be adjusted in height and lowered to different heights. It sticks to your dashboard securely and won't damage it. When on the go, it also works well as a portable phone holder because it attaches to a variety of surfaces. It seems to be well made, durable, and competitively priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have an older vehicle that does not have the ability to show navigation or texts on the screen. This car phone holder is perfect! It is adjustable to fit any phone, and offers various ways to attach (permanently or temporarily) to the dash/air vents. Great value and does exactly what it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Squeeze it tight!
reviews.reviewText: Versatile and easy to install. Sturdy and sticks well to the dash. The side supports are not curved towards the front so that big phones and phones with protective cases can fit, but this means that you need to squeeze the sides hard when inserting the phone so it won’t fall out. If you do this, it works great! (iPhone 15 Pro Max with case)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing phone stand
reviews.reviewText: Was slightly difficult to get it to stick to my car, however once I got it to stick, it hasn’t moved. Holds my iPhone 14 Pro perfectly and doesn’t move around at all while driving, even over bumpy roads. Would 100% recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very practical good phone car holder
reviews.reviewText: Very practical phone car holder. good suction, easy to install. fits most phones. only improvement would be if it had a back magnet plate, maybe they can have a pro model. some phones like iphone have magnets helping to make them extra secure. sometimes on the phone plate install a magnet on the back to be attracted to there plates. i would recommend this product.
